slogan.long: Für Sie entwickeln wir responsive Webseiten und Apps, die Ihr Business erfolgreich machen

message.placeholder: Geben Sie hier Ihre Nachricht an uns ein...

privacy.label: Ich bin mit der Datenschutzerklärung einverstanden.

about.headline: We are an agile creative technology studio
about.copy: GeilDanke is a creative technology studio. We're specialized in effective and innovative web development with a focus on performance, usability and content. Our projects are always mobile-friendly, our solutions elegant and simple. Because we believe in web technology and a web for everybody. Reliability and maintainability is an inherent part of our working ethics. That's why we have agile workflows and a test-driven development process. Working remotely means that we can work with the best experts from anywhere.

slogan.long: For You We Create Mobile-friendly Websites and Apps That Will Make Your Business a Success
